//read csv
val blob_account_name = "hozhaogen2"
val blob_container_name = "sparkjob"
val blob_relative_path = "QingTestFolder/Persons24.csv"  //sqlscripts_Persons.csv
val wasbs_path = s"wasbs://${blob_container_name}@${blob_account_name}.blob.core.windows.net/${blob_relative_path}"
spark.conf.set("fs.azure.account.key.hozhaogen2.blob.core.windows.net" , "ZiG2L5QLPxPMkMzhK/f+NfFTPxSmHXXds6odR5b3icnEEAg5zaDnJxB5drto5Kzbax/QU5jA0qeDgLIBL3UILQ==")

import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
val customSchema = (new StructType).add("Id_P",IntegerType,true).add("LastName",StringType,true).add("FirstName",StringType,true).add("Address",StringType,true).add("City",StringType,true)

val readDf = spark.read.option("header", "true").option("delimiter",",").schema(customSchema).csv(wasbs_path)
readDf.show

val readDf1 = spark.read.option("header", "true").option("delimiter",",").schema(customSchema).csv(wasbs_path).groupBy("Id_P").sum()
readDf1.show
